overview: Brought to because you demanded it. Volume #3 from Regiments Bad Boys series directed by the penultimate director of hottie hunk hardcore, Paul Barressi. If that’s not enough, there’s also Trent Atkins, Bobby Bacon, Josh Peters, Hawk McCallistar, Raul, Josh Benjamin and Park Wiley. They re young, brazen, rebellious and irresistible!
title: Bad Boys 3
